## Bio

I am an aspiring economist specializing on micro-econometrics related to health, labor and environmental issues. Currently, I work as a freelancer specializing on Monitoring and Evaluation component of research where my role is survey administration and data analytics. I have worked as a research associate for a couple of national and international projects and also as a graphic designer for a few national-level events in the past.
